definitions.definition: each of a pair of long narrow pieces of hard flexible material, typically pointed and turned up at the front, fastened under the feet for gliding over snow.
a device similar to a ski attached beneath a vehicle or aircraft.
of, relating to, or used for skiing.
travel over snow on skis; take part in the sport or recreation of skiing.
ski on (a particular ski run or type of snow).
examples: spring snow is not always easy to ski
